registration.policy: By registering, you agree to the terms of the provision on the processing and protection of personal data and the user agreement
success: To complete the process of activating your account, please check your email and follow the link in the email we sent. After that, you will be able to use all the features of our site.

If you did not receive the email, please check your spam folder. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to 
Contact us. 
Thank you!

password-errors.quantity: Password must be at least 8 characters
password-errors.oneDigit: Password must contain at least one number
password-errors.oneUppercaseLetter: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password-errors.oneLowercaseLetter: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password-errors.oneSpecialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character
